subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored in the 90th minute as host Real Madrid came back to earn a 3-2 victory against Manchester City in a Champions League opener that turned into a wild shootout over the last 25 minutes.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo scored in the 90th minute as host Real Madrid came back to earn a 3-2 victory against Manchester City in a Champions League opener that turned into a wild shootout over the last 25 minutes.
